GRI 102-50 Report BoundariesThe information in this report covers all of Adobe's global operations and subsidiaries during the 2020 fiscal year (November 30, 2019 to November 27, 2020) 
except where otherwise stated.At Adobe, our commitment is to conduct business responsibly within our operations, with our customers and partners, and as it 
impacts our communities around the globe. The following disclosures help demonstrate our commitment to responsible business
